Little_Rock.Boone House (Little Rock, Arkansas):
The Boone House is a historic house located at 4014 Lookout in Little Rock, Arkansas.


== Description and history ==
It is a 2-1/2 story masonry structure, built out of a combination of fieldstone, brick, and stucco. It is built in a rusticated Tudor Revival style, and was built in 1927 to a design by Thompson & Harding.
